name: Healing Hand
explanation: You touch a creature and heal them for 2 + 1d4. For each Green point spent after 1, healing is increased by 1d4. Spend 1 White point to target another creature.

name: Changing Winds
explanation: Target a creature in 60 feet of you, the creature has to make a dexterity saving throw. On a failed save the creature is pulled or pushed 10 feet. If the season is summer it takes 4d4 fire damage, in winter the creature is stunned and takes 1d6 cold damage, in spring the creature is healed 2d6, in autumn the creature is pushed or pulled 10  additional feets and takes 1d8 lightning damage. For each green point after 2, add 1  additional die according to the seasons.

name: Pomegrenade
explanation: You throw a pomegranate into a hex that you can see in 60 feet of you, exploding and dealing 2d6 nature damage in the main hex, it also splashes to the surrounding hexes dealing 1d4 nature damage  . The creature on the main hex must make a saving throw, on a succesfull save the damage is halved. For each green point after 2, add an additional 1d4 to the splash damage.
